binary_file_format.comment: File format for Windows animated cursors

data.name: headerSize

data.comment: Number of stored frames in this animation

data.name: numSteps

data.comment: These files always seem to contain just one plane.

data.comment: Default display rate in 1/60s (Rate = 60/displayRate fps)
